title: gAndhiyai pOloru
sahitya:
gAndhiyai pOloru shAnta svarUpanai kANbadum emahAtmA


anupallavi

  mAndarilE jnAna yOgam mEvum tava vEndarilE svaya nalam shiridumillA


caraNam    ahimsai tanilE buddhanavan Atma shOdanaiyil EshunAthan avan
 aru paghaiyai venra karma dhIranavan namadu bhAgyattAl indiya nATTil avataritta
